title: MC进游戏就闪退，求问怎么解决
author: D.island
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-3-17 15:02 编辑 

大概是这样的，游戏是正版，点play进游戏什么的都正常，能进到游戏里，然后选完存档进入世界，进入世界两三秒以后就会闪退，代码是这些


Completely ignored arguments: [--nativeLauncherVersion, 301]
[19:00:30] [Client thread/INFO]: Setting user: Desertisland
[19:00:30] [Client thread/INFO]: (Session ID is <censored>)
[19:00:32] [Client thread/INFO]: LWJGL Version: 2.9.4
[19:00:33] [Client thread/INFO]: Reloading ResourceManager: Default
[19:00:50] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Starting up SoundSystem...
[19:00:50] [Thread-5/INFO]: Initializing LWJGL OpenAL

[19:00:52] [Client thread/INFO]: Created: 1024x512 textures-atlas
[19:00:52] [Thread-5/INFO]: OpenAL initialized.
[19:00:52] [Sound Library Loader/INFO]: Sound engine started
[19:00:59] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting integrated minecraft server version 1.9
[19:00:59] [Server thread/INFO]: Generating keypair
[19:01:00] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing start region for level 0
[19:01:01] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 0%
[19:01:02] [Server thread/INFO]: Preparing spawn area: 56%
[19:01:03] [Server thread/INFO]: Changing view distance to 12, from 10
[19:01:04] [Server thread/INFO]: Desertisland[local:E:0ab2a963] logged in with entity id 541 at (-128.75816247599522, 84.0, 237.76179771316853)
[19:01:04] [Server thread/INFO]: Desertisland 加入了游戏
[19:01:04] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving and pausing game...
[19:01:04] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level 'Desertisland'/Overworld
[19:01:05] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level 'Desertisland'/Nether
[19:01:05] [Server thread/INFO]: Saving chunks for level 'Desertisland'/The End
[19:01:05] [Server thread/WARN]: Can't keep up! Did the system time change, or is the server overloaded? Running 2081ms behind, skipping 41 tick(s)
#
# A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment:
#
# EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION (0xc0000005) at pc=0x00007ffc8a2e628c, pid=6936, tid=6240

Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release

然后并不想用非官方登录器，求问怎么解决这个问题

replies.author: gamerteam
replies.txt_content: JVM虚拟机炸了，要么是显卡驱动爆炸，要么就是Java有问题

replies.author: D.island
replies.txt_content:
gamerteam 发表于 2016-3-17 08:33
JVM虚拟机炸了，要么是显卡驱动爆炸，要么就是Java有问题
怎么解决呢？我重新下载了客户端没用

replies.author: gamerteam
replies.txt_content:
D.island 发表于 2016-3-17 08:36
怎么解决呢？我重新下载了客户端没用
换个版本的Java和更新显卡驱动，主要是这个log提供的信息略少，目前只看到JVM爆炸的问题

replies.author: konun
replies.txt_content: 把电脑砸了 就行了

replies.author: D.island
replies.txt_content:
gamerteam 发表于 2016-3-17 08:50
换个版本的Java和更新显卡驱动，主要是这个log提供的信息略少，目前只看到JVM爆炸的问题 ...
我的JAVA是游戏自带的，没有额外安装过，然后昨天我删了所有存档后建了一个新的存档，之后就好使了一次，等我再把老存档载入之后就又不好使了。
更新显卡驱动就会好使么？

replies.author: D.island
replies.txt_content:
gamerteam 发表于 2016-3-17 08:50
换个版本的Java和更新显卡驱动，主要是这个log提供的信息略少，目前只看到JVM爆炸的问题 ...
我更新了驱动。。。然而并不好使。。

replies.author: tzxwdu
replies.txt_content: 换一个存档行吗？有没有mod？

replies.author: D.island
replies.txt_content:
tzxwdu 发表于 2016-3-17 19:31
换一个存档行吗？有没有mod？
纯净版，正版，三天了就有一次新建存档进去过，然后就不好使
不能解决，这是内存不够
